name: Uno reverse
ability: [+0 or +1 outsider] if you are picked by any non-demon ability, if the ability should affect you it affects them and if it should affect them it affects you

name: Antitoxin
otherNightReminder: Wake up the antitoxin to choose a player
ability: [+0 or +1 outsider] Each night, choose a player, you learn if they are under any negative effects

name: Minion Destroyed 1000
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Grasshopper to choose a player
ability: [+0 or +1 outsider] Each night*, choose a player, if they are a minion, they die, any good player becomes drunk until dusk. If you are choosen by a minion ability, you are poisoned for the next day and then die.

name: Grasshopper
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Grasshopper to choose a player
ability: Each night*, choose a player different from last night, you become their alignment. You do not learn your current alignment

name: Tombraiser
ability: If you are executed, you win and everyone else loses (even if you are dead)

name: Volume slider
otherNightReminder: Wake up Volume slider to choose a player
ability: Each night*, choose a player different from last night, they cannot speak publicly during the next day or they die
